title: Client
body: My client has been very laggy recently, in game my ping is low and my fps is fine but outside in the client it loads very slowly and everything is generally slow. Anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: Your pc could be going through some stress if you're getting this during champion select.  My suggestion here would be to enable [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode to disable the fancy stuff and reduce that stress.  I hope that helps!
I Find that it lags right when i leave a game and am trying to join into another queue. When I choose my roles in the lobby the icons lag. Is this because the previous game is shutting down or what??
